GRID.name: Vouchers
GRID.where: (transtype != 'CANCEL' AND voucher_id not in(select voucher_link::integer from vw_vouchers where voucher_link !=''))

GRID.name: Agent Voucher Report
GRID.where: (transtype != 'CANCEL' AND voucher_id not in(select voucher_link::integer from vw_vouchers where voucher_link !=''))
